price: Na tukawanyeshea mvua. Ni ovu kweli kweli hiyo mvua ya walio kwisha onywa.
arabic: وَأَمۡطَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم مَّطَرٗاۖ فَسَآءَ مَطَرُ ٱلۡمُنذَرِينَ
footnotes: Na Sisi tukawanyeshea mvua hao mafisadi, mvua ya adhabu na nakama. Ilikuwa mvua ya kuwahiliki walio onywa kuwa watapata adhabu chungu, na wala wasisikie.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-amṭarnā ʿalayhim maṭaran fasāa maṭaru al-mundharīna
